tasks: Exact calculation of quantizer constants for arbitrary lattices
methods: Algorithm for the exact computer-aided construction of the Voronoi cells of lattices
Optimization of a family of lattices
title: Exact calculation of quantizer constants for arbitrary lattices
abstract: We present an algorithm for the exact computer-aided construction of the Voronoi cells of lattices with known symmetry group. Our algorithm scales better than linearly with the total number of faces and is applicable to dimensions beyond 12, which previous methods could not achieve. The new algorithm is applied to the Coxeter-Todd lattice $K_{12}$ as well as to a family of lattices obtained from laminating $K_{12}$. By optimizing this family, we obtain a new best 13-dimensional lattice quantizer (among the lattices with published exact quantizer constants).
